title: 1930s American midwestern typography
content:
Hi, My name is Shaharisma and I'm from Malaysia.   
   
I'm looking for free downloadable Script 12 Pitch True Type Fonts (Windows based) for my latest college project. Can someone please help me out as I dont have any credit cards or cheque to pay for the fonts at www.MYFonts.com.   
   
I would be so grateful if someone could e-mail me with that font in particular.   
   
Thanks a lot.
author: anonymous
